name: Content
description:
Content is a point-and-click horror adventure game. Become Anthony, an influencer looking for content that will make his videos viral. Investigate the cases, combine and use tools to overcome the given challenges. Sometimes you have to use your reflexes to dodge the threat of an unexpectedly attacking creatures.

The fate of the protagonist, Anthony, is in your hands.

Synopsis

Anthony is an influencer and runs a cat channel. One day, he is provoked by his fellow influencer that the cat videos aren't popular anymore. To make matters worse, Anthony is in trouble with the rent being pushed back, so he plans to make a video of a giant insect and make it a success...

Features

  • Unique scenes that is only possible in point-and-click adventure
  • Bizarre and interesting events
  • A different kind of fun from classic adventures through QTE
  • Unique pixel art style
